title: RIOT DIDN'T GIVE ME AWARDS FOR SEASON 6
body:
**SEASON 6 ENDED  7 NOVEMBER 2016,AM I RIGHT?I WAS WAITING AROUND 5 DAYS TO GIVE ME AWARDS FOR SILVER,AND RIOT DIDNT GIVE ME NEITHER ICON NOR THE ROUND OF ME??WHAT IS GOING ON PLEASE HELP ME IM SO PISHED OFF...I AM SILVER 4,I WAS WAITING FOR MY AWARDS,I TRIED TO SEND MESSAGE TO RIOT AND TELL ME AGAIN AND I AGAIN I HAVE TO LOGIN,I DID AND DIDNT SENT ME A LINK OR SOMETHING TO SEND ME REQUEST__**
_**PLEASE HELP ME**_

replies.body:
i dont have any reward too 
i wait more than 2 week and i send a lot of request . so,  nothing happend 
i am so scared about what if riot game forget us and start the new seacon without giving us reward
i am silver 5 
and i hope this msg will be seeing  by riot game 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

We've experienced [some issues](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) in getting some ranked rewards out to some players. We're still working on getting them out, but if you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll take a further look into this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I have the same problem im still waiting to get my gold award !
Still waiting too, everyone I match up with seems to have received theirs. :p
Join the club, I am still waiting on my Plat IV rewards.
